name: Hungry Ghost
description:
Become the biggest ghost in town by eating your competition!

Instructions:

  • Use the arrow keys or WASD to move your ghost around
  • Eat the ghosts that are smaller than you
  • Avoid the ghosts that are bigger than you
  • Press P to pause the game

This game is still a prototype. As we explore more features, we'll be updating it periodically. Follow Nanaimo Labs to be updated when the next version is ready! Any and all feedback about what is fun or not is greatly appreciated!

Credits:

  • Development, Art, and Design: Dale Lemieux
  • Background and Character Art: Miko Charbonneau
  • Music
    • "Myst on the Moor.mp3" by Kevin MacLeod of incompetech.com
    • "Rain and Thunder 4.wav" by FlatHill of Freesound.org
